alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:10PM EST until January 29 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations between a glaze and one tenth of an inch. The location with the greatest chance for snow accumulation is northern Berrien County. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to start as snow in Southern Lower Michigan before mixing with and changing over to freezing rain. Some snow is expected to mix back in Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
